missionDescription: Add a single command/script (e.g., validate_outputs.py or Makefile target) that (1) runs the scaffold generator and (2) asserts presence of required files (REPORT_OUTLINE.md, CASE_STUDY_TEMPLATE.md, METADATA_SCHEMA.json, WORKLOG.md), emitting a validation summary to /outputs/logs/validation.txt.
missionSuccessCriteria: Complete the urgent task identified by Meta-Coordinator
